title: We’re expanding our team and seeking a Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager (Remote).
job_overview:
We’re expanding our team and seeking a Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager (Remote).
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on capabilities

Job description:

Run and optimize paid ads on Google & Meta platforms.

Analyze and improve ad performance to achieve KPIs.

Work remotely with flexibility.

Requirements:

1+ year experience running Google Ads or Facebook Ads.

Strong analytical skills and marketing mindset.
